title: Adversary attempts unauthorized cross-biz read Snapshot

view.title: Adversary attempts unauthorized cross-biz read
view.subtitle: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

blocks.title: Adversary Cross Biz Read completed
blocks.message: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.
